com.paydiant.android.common.util

Class AppUtils.RootedDeviceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.common.util.AppUtils.RootedDeviceUtils
  • Enclosing class:
    AppUtils
    Deprecated. 
    Not recommended for use in Android apps

    @Deprecated
public static class AppUtils.RootedDeviceUtils
extends Object
    RootedDevicesUtils class provide set of utility methods to detect rooted android devices Disclaimer: IMPORTANT: The isDeviceRooted() method of RootedDeviceUtils class is just to check whether the users device is rooted or not and DO NOT provide a mechanism to secure the data. There might be other applications that prevent detecting a rooted device, so this method can provide an incorrect value. Therefore please make necessary arrangement to secure your data. *
    Since:
    4.4.0.3
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
